about_the_game:
The Gimmick! Original Soundtrack is now available! This immersive and captivating score brings Sunsoft's cult platformer to life and is the perfect complement to your time with Yumetaro in Gimmick! Special Edition.

With his jazzy fusion compositions, Kageyama captures the 8-bit era perfectly and transports you to the golden age of gaming. It pushed 8-bit music to its limits with a custom sound chip called "Sunsoft 5B" in the original Famicom cartridge. The tunes were just too good for the console!

This soundtrack includes all tracks from the original Gimmick!, captured in pristine quality on actual hardware. Please lie down and soar to the skies with Kageyama's magical band!

With his jazzy fusion compositions, Kageyama captures the 8-bit era perfectly and transports you to the golden age of gaming. It pushed 8-bit music to its limits with a custom sound chip called "Sunsoft 5B" in the original Famicom cartridge. The tunes were just too good for the console!

This soundtrack includes all tracks from the original Gimmick!, captured in pristine quality on actual hardware. Please lie down and soar to the skies with Kageyama's magical band!

Minimum:

short_description: Introducing The Gimmick! Original Soundtrack, the dynamic score that brings Sunsoft's cult classic to life. It's a one-way ticket to the 8-bit era with jazzy fusion songs that were literally too powerful for NES™. This OST contains all the original tracks in pristine quality!
